Models

Treat EV Batteries at End-of-Life
  • Decomposition
  • ICOM

Activity: Recycle

Description

Notes:

Definitions:
Recycling - process of transforming waste materials into a reusable form which can be similar to the original product or not. Adapted from ISO 24161:2022, 3.1.3.10.

Standards:
SAE J2974_201902, Technical Information Report on Automotive Battery Recycling

SAE J3071_201604, Automotive Battery Recycling Identification and Cross Contamination Prevention

SAE J2984_202109, Chemical Identification of Transportation Batteries for Recycling

SERI R2 Standard, Responsible Recycling ("R2") Standard for Electronics Recyclers

e-Stewards Standard, Responsible Recycling and Reuse of Electronic Equipment

ISO 8887-1:2017, Technical product documentation - Design for manufacturing, assembling, disassembling and end-of-life processing - Part 1: General concepts and requirements

References:
Baum, Z. J., Bird, R. E., Yu, X., & Ma, J. (2022). Lithium-ion battery recycling- overview of techniques and trends.

Bird, R., Baum, Z. J., Yu, X., & Ma, J. (2022). The regulatory environment for lithium-ion battery recycling.

Chen, M., Ma, X., Chen, B., Arsenault, R., Karlson, P., Simon, N., & Wang, Y. (2019). Recycling end-of-life electric vehicle lithium-ion batteries. Joule, 3(11), 2622-2646.

Gaines, L. (2014). The future of automotive lithium-ion battery recycling: Charting a sustainable course. Sustainable Materials and Technologies, 1, 2-7.

Gaines, L., Richa, K., & Spangenberger, J. (2018). Key issues for Li-ion battery recycling. MRS Energy & Sustainability, 5, E14.

Georgi-Maschler, T., Friedrich, B., Weyhe, R., Heegn, H., & Rutz, M. (2012). Development of a recycling process for Li-ion batteries. Journal of power sources, 207, 173-182.

Harper, G., Sommerville, R., Kendrick, E., Driscoll, L., Slater, P., Stolkin, R., ... & Anderson, P. (2019). Recycling lithium-ion batteries from electric vehicles. Nature, 575(7781), 75-86.

Ma, X., Meng, Z., Bellonia, M. V., Spangenberger, J., Harper, G., Gratz, E., ... & Wang, Y. (2025). The evolution of lithium-ion battery recycling. Nature Reviews Clean Technology, 1(1), 75-94.

Neumann, J., Petranikova, M., Meeus, M., Gamarra, J. D., Younesi, R., Winter, M., & Nowak, S. (2022). Recycling of lithium-ion batteries—current state of the art, circular economy, and next generation recycling. Advanced energy materials, 12(17), 2102917.

Pinegar, H., & Smith, Y. R. (2019). Recycling of end-of-life lithium ion batteries, Part I: Commercial processes. Journal of Sustainable Metallurgy, 5(3), 402-416. doi: s40831-019-00235-9
